entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
